column3: b'@HSBC_UK Wow, coal use (in terms of TWh) has increased by nearly 30% in the last ~ 20 years so how much will it increase by in the next ~ 20 years \xf0\x9f\xa4\x94 \xf0\x9f\x98\x8c @ajlabs #green #ClimateCrisis #renewableenergy #greed https://t.co/xvNta7Adis'
b'RT @EnergySysCat: 13 innovators have been selected for the 1st cohort of our new Climate Innovation Platform (CIP), focused on driving #ene\xe2\x80\xa6'
